definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: When alkali is added to such compounds a series of proton dissociations occurs.
sentences.chinese: 當堿加到這類化合物中，將發生一系列質子離解作用。

sentences.english: An aqueous caustic solution removes carrier gas impurities harmful to the detector cell.
sentences.chinese: 苛性堿溶液去除運載氣體中對檢測元件有害的雜質。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the long-term toxicity of theacrine by continuously oral administration to rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察連續灌胃給予苦茶堿對大鼠的毒性反應。

sentences.english: This specificity probably resided in the sequence of base pairs along the molecules.
sentences.chinese: 這種專一性可能寄寓在分子的堿基對順序之中。

sentences.english: It may be composed of allelochemics such as alkaloids or terpenes.
sentences.chinese: 它可以由異種化合物例如生物堿或萜稀組成。

sentences.english: The corresponding reaction of acetaldehyde is subject to general base catalysis.
sentences.chinese: 乙醛相應的反應服從廣義的堿催化。

sentences.english: May be neutralized with dilute mineral acid or vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 本品呈微堿性，可用稀釋的礦物酸或食用醋酸中和之。
